__e: She knew me only as the Marquis de San Marco and as such. I could only sing her a song and steal her heart.
I'd rather spend the night with the Marquis De Sade, - and yes, I know he's dead.
From now on, you'll be my personal servants but you will only know me as the Marquis de San Marco.
Then we move the Marquis of Huntly's army south.
There was a scandal two years ago with a young marquess of Lowestoft.

He wept, had her laid out in a closed coffin and buried three days later. But his sister had noticed that a certain Marquis von Bernbach, who'd got on so well with Frau von Werthausen these past weeks, had suddenly disappeared, just like half the young woman's wardrobe.
